channel.title: Leveling Is Messed Up
channel.description:
Ok, when i use block i increase my attack level and when i use kick i get my def level up and when i use punch i get my str level up. Here is an example: http://prntscr.com/12zzq9
Can someone please help me fix this?

item.title: Leveling Is Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

damnit, thanks for tryin tho, im pi btw. Still looking for help.

Read full topic

item.title: Leveling Is Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

For delta search for the method AttackNPC. if you are PI i dont know…

Read full topic

item.title: Leveling Is Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:2, topic:518333”]In method AttackNPC you should have this;

if (FightType == 2){ TotalExp = (double)(350 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); }
You can code from there.[/quote]
where should i look for this?

Read full topic

item.title: Leveling Is Messed Up
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

In method AttackNPC you should have this;

if (FightType == 2){ TotalExp = (double)(350 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); }
You can code from there.

Read full topic
